abilities.name: demon shade
abilities.description: When out of combat, Evelynn enters Demon Shade. Demon Shade heals Evelynn when she is low on health and grants Camouflage after level 6.

abilities.name: hate spike
abilities.description: Evelynn strikes out with her Lasher, dealing damage to the first unit hit. Then, Evelynn can shoot a line of spikes at nearby foes up to 3 times.

abilities.name: allure
abilities.description: Evelynn curses her target, causing her next attack or spell after a delay to charm her target and reduce their magic resist.

abilities.name: whiplash
abilities.description: Evelynn whips her target with her Lasher, dealing damage. She then gains movement speed for a short duration.

abilities.name: last caress
abilities.description: Evelynn briefly goes untargetable and decimates the area in front of her before warping backwards a long distance.
